*Goldfinger* (film)
===================


* [Article](/wiki/Goldfinger_(film))
* [Talk](/wiki/Talk:Goldfinger_(film))

* [Language](#p-lang "Language")
* [Watch](/w/index.php?title=Special:UserLogin&returnto=Goldfinger+%28film%29)
* [Edit](/w/index.php?title=Goldfinger_(film)&action=edit)



For the 2023 Hong Kong film, see [The Goldfinger](/wiki/The_Goldfinger "The Goldfinger").

***Goldfinger*** is a 1964 [spy film](/wiki/Spy_film "Spy film") and the third installment in the [*James Bond* series](/wiki/List_of_James_Bond_films "List of James Bond films") produced by [Eon Productions](/wiki/Eon_Productions "Eon Productions"), starring [Sean Connery](/wiki/Sean_Connery "Sean Connery") as the fictional [MI6](/wiki/Secret_Intelligence_Service "Secret Intelligence Service") agent [James Bond](/wiki/James_Bond_filmography "James Bond filmography"). It is based on the 1959 [novel of the same title](/wiki/Goldfinger_(novel) "Goldfinger (novel)") by [Ian Fleming](/wiki/Ian_Fleming "Ian Fleming"). The film also stars [Honor Blackman](/wiki/Honor_Blackman "Honor Blackman"), [Gert Fr√∂be](/wiki/Gert_Fr%C3%B6be "Gert Fr√∂be") and [Shirley Eaton](/wiki/Shirley_Eaton "Shirley Eaton"). *Goldfinger* was produced by [Albert R. Broccoli](/wiki/Albert_R._Broccoli "Albert R. Broccoli") and [Harry Saltzman](/wiki/Harry_Saltzman "Harry Saltzman"). The film was the first of four Bond films directed by [Guy Hamilton](/wiki/Guy_Hamilton "Guy Hamilton").

*Goldfinger* (film)
===================


* [Article](/wiki/Goldfinger_(film))
* [Talk](/wiki/Talk:Goldfinger_(film))

* [Language](#p-lang "Language")

For the 2023 Hong Kong film, see [The Goldfinger](/wiki/The_Goldfinger "The Goldfinger").

***Goldfinger*** is a 1964 [spy film](/wiki/Spy_film "Spy film") and the third installment in the [*James Bond* series](/wiki/List_of_James_Bond_films "List of James Bond films") produced by [Eon Productions](/wiki/Eon_Productions "Eon Productions"), starring [Sean Connery](/wiki/Sean_Connery "Sean Connery") as the fictional [MI6](/wiki/Secret_Intelligence_Service "Secret Intelligence Service") agent [James Bond](/wiki/James_Bond_filmography "James Bond filmography"). It is based on the 1959 [novel of the same title](/wiki/Goldfinger_(novel) "Goldfinger (novel)") by [Ian Fleming](/wiki/Ian_Fleming "Ian Fleming"). The film also stars [Honor Blackman](/wiki/Honor_Blackman "Honor Blackman"), [Gert Fr√∂be](/wiki/Gert_Fr%C3%B6be "Gert Fr√∂be") and [Shirley Eaton](/wiki/Shirley_Eaton "Shirley Eaton"). *Goldfinger* was produced by [Albert R. Broccoli](/wiki/Albert_R._Broccoli "Albert R. Broccoli") and [Harry Saltzman](/wiki/Harry_Saltzman "Harry Saltzman"). The film was the first of four Bond films directed by [Guy Hamilton](/wiki/Guy_Hamilton "Guy Hamilton").
